summary: Highly skilled Full Stack Developer with 7 years of experience in building and maintaining responsive web applications. Proficient in both front-end and back-end technologies, with a strong focus on user experience and problem-solving. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams and delivering high-quality solutions to meet project deadlines.

experience.title: Web Developer
detail: Designed and developed web applications that meet customer requirements.
Developed the entire system within a very tight time frame.
Design a modern-looking websites that are easy to understand, with clear navigation and a smooth user experience.

experience.title: Senior Pre-Sales Engineer
detail: Designed enterprise surveillance solutions based on the needs of the organization.
Coordinated with business partner and identify solution components for cost estimation.
Presented technical information about our products to a wide variety of customers.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
detail: Designed web applications to support internal process between departments.
Improved web functionality and performance of the existing website.
Maintained the system and fix problems found on the website.

experience.title: Pre-Sales Engineer
detail: Designed CCTV solutions based on the customer requirements.
Identified solution components for cost estimation.
Sales support for product technical information.

experience.title: IT Engineer (Application Developer)
detail: Team member of internal web development under IT department.
Responsible for UI design, data recording process and database design.
Troubleshooting application errors.

experience.title: Service Knowledge Development
detail: Team member of internal web development under customer service department.
Developed web application to support working process.
On-site support for IT services at customer sites.

education.institute: King Mongkut's Institute of Technology Ladkrabang

projects.name: Cart service at Megabangna
detail: Designed and developed web application to embeded in the Mega Smile Rewards application.
Created a web page for administrative staff to serve customers at the counter.
There are many conditions used to check before providing cart service, such as time period, duration, number of carts remaining, availability of counter service.

projects.name: Pacifica Group
detail: Generate Excel and PDF files from the order file that exported from e-Commerce system.
Process order data with master data and generate output into the specific format.
Supports working with multiple brands to upload and convert the order data.

projects.name: POS App
detail: Developed a web application that can be used with a barcode scanner.
Able to manage product in store.
Sales history and statistics report.

projects.name: D-Tracking Chiang Rai
detail: Developed web application to working with Traccar GPS Tracking System.
Created a dashboard screen to display statistics on the operation of garbage collection trucks in Chiang Rai Province.
Supports configuration of garbage collection truck properties. To be used to calculate the amount of garbage that can be collected per round.
